exchange.unfavorableSwapTip: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
exchange.differenceBetweenTip: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.
exchange.tradeProtocolIncentive: A portion of each trade({{ tradeFee }}%) goes to liquidity providers as a protocol incentive.
exchange.transactionUnfavorablyPercentage: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage
exchange.transactionPendingLong: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long
exchange.outputEstimatedTip: Output is estimated. You will receive at least {{ tokenAmount }} {{ tokenCode }} or the transaction will revert
exchange.inputEstimatedTip: Input is estimated. You will sell at most {{ tokenAmount }} {{ tokenCode }} or the transaction will revert.
exchange.SwappingFromTo: Swapping {{ fromTokenAmount }} {{ fromTokenCode }} for {{ toTokenAmount }} {{ fromTokenCode }}
exchange.confirmTransactionInWallet: Confirm this transaction in your wallet
exchange.addLiquidityReceiveLPT: Add liquidity to receive LP tokens
exchange.addLiquidityTip: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens that represent your share. If you don't see a pool you joined in this list, try importing a pool below.
exchange.noSeePoolJoined: Don't see a pool you joined?
exchange.connectWalletViewYourLiquidity: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
exchange.connectWalletFindPools: Connect to a wallet to find pools
exchange.selectTokenFindYourLiquidity: Select a token to find your liquidity.
exchange.youPoolDontHaveLiquidity: You don’t have liquidity in this pool yet.
exchange.toolFindPairsTip: Use this tool to find pairs that don`t automatically appear in the interface.
exchange.firstLiquidityProviderTip: You are the first liquidity provider.The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
exchange.addLiquidityAfter: When you add liquidity, you will receive pool tokens representing your position.These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
exchange.tokensCommonlyPairedOtherTokens: These tokens are commonly paired with other tokens.
exchange.manageTokensTip: Tip: Custom tokens are stored locally in your browser
exchange.manageListAddInput: https:// or ipfs:// or ENS name
exchange.removingPoolTip: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
exchange.byAddingLiquidityTip: By adding liquidity you'll earn 0.3% of all trades on this pair proportional to your share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
